DOC.brief_summary: Evaluate safety immunogenicity three dosage level swine influenza vaccine child age 3 < 9 year , adolescent 9 < 18 year , adult 18 < 65 year elderly 65 year old .

Acceptable birth control method define one following : 1 . Hormonal contraceptive ( oral , injection , transdermal patch , implant , cervical ring ) ; 2 .
